item.title: Introduction
item.description: Start A Business For Free Available on iOS and Android devices Cloud-based Work offline Features Shopping cart Promotion & Membership (~ 2017.02.28) Sales statistics (~ 2017.03.15) Reselling & Online delivery (~ 2017.03.31) Not Supported User Interface Payment Push & Notification Downloads Current(v0.1.2) New Features: Adds /cart/clear-cart API Bug Fixes: Fixes issue error parsing Android SDK: pos.
